channel.title: Hannah on SoCal Ranch - a (sub)urban ranching experiment in organic and digital life
channel.description: Recent content in Hannah on SoCal Ranch - a (sub)urban ranching experiment in organic and digital life

item.title: 2012 Balloon Launch @ Vista Ridge
item.description: Ah, morning coffee and a nice walk over to the clubhouse. Much better today than yesterday; I was warmer and I felt better. I have about a hundred pictures posted to Google+ that I shared with Family and Friends. Let me know if you can’t find them. These are my favorite pictures of the morning.

item.title: Cleveland Zoo
item.description: After a morning in the garden and reading with Mama Rosa we went down to the Cleveland Zoo to see what we could see.

item.title: Egg Hunt
item.description: An annual Friday afternoon egg hunt …

item.title: AM Girl
item.description: After running a fever for a few days Hannah was back to her usual morning self.Showing off her pigtails and hula hoop

item.title: Epic Powder Day
item.description: It was most certainly out of the ordinary. And she wanted to go faster while yelling at me to let her do it on her own ðŸ™‚ It was almost as much work as riding the park and the pipe or carving out heelside turns that compliment the toeside. It was more fun than I have ever had on the slopes and I returned home a very proud papa. At least equal to being hip deep in powder on a double black diamond above the treeline and more fulfilling than turning my first frontside 360.

item.title: Snowboarding and Strategy
item.description: I put my bindings on the new snowboard. It’s light! I think. I have big plans for the t6. Hannah is getting smart, strategic almost. She asks set up questions anticipating what my answer will be. Then she follows up with what she really wants.

item.title: Trick or Treat Street
item.description: Last night was Halloween. Hannah was a Ladybug, and a very cute one at that. She was a little funny at the Halloween party. I am not sure if it is because she fell off Bobo (Totally her parental units fault), the lack of a nap or something else. At one point, after she got bonked by the swing, she only wanted to play with the toys, she didn’t want me to talk but she wanted me to stay with her.
